desc_content.paragraph: Sequence strip to load a video
Representation of alpha information in the RGBA pixels

list_item.paragraph: STRAIGHT Straight, RGB channels in transparent pixels are unaffected by the alpha channel.
PREMUL Premultiplied, RGB channels in transparent pixels are multiplied by the alpha channel.

desc_content.paragraph: Adjust the intensity of the input’s color
For MPEG movies, preseek this many frames
For files with several movie streams, use the stream with the given index
Use a preview proxy and/or timecode index for this strip

list_item.paragraph: INDIVIDUAL Individual, Individual files for each view with the prefix as defined by the scene views.
STEREO_3D Stereo 3D, Single file with an encoded stereo pair.

desc_content.paragraph: Retrieve metadata of the movie file

field_body.paragraph: The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
